Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: It seems to be a modern day miracle but thanks to years of research at the University of Ben Gurion in the Negev and several technological breakthroughs, an Israeli company has designed a device to enable the paralyzed to move their hands freely once again.
